nodes.text: Rett II was the second planet in the Rettna system, and was the site of a Jante mining colony. It was attacked and captured by the Jante's sector neighbors, the Freda. During the New Order, the decades-old feud between Jante and Freda erupted into full-scale war as each sabotaged the other's mining operations. Imperial forces were called in to put an end to the hostilities.
